analysisEngineMetaData.name: POS Density Feature: Lexical Words
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Calculates lexical word density of the text. Lexical words include for English: the Penn Treebank tags JJ, JJR, JJS, RB, RBR, RBS, WRB, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ; for German: the Tiger tags: ADJA ADJD ADV NN NE VVFIN VVIMP VVINF VVIZU VVPP VMFIN VMIMP VMINF VMIZU VMPP FM XY for Dutch: the CGN tags: Adj, V, N, Adv for Portuguese: the Universal Dependencies tags ADJ ADV NOUN PROPN VERB
Formula: lexicalWordDensity = numLexicalWords / numTokens
AAE dependency: SentenceAnnotator.xml TokenAnnotator.xml NTokenFeature.xml POSAnnotator.xml
